geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-eul mandeusigo geudaedeul-eul wihae cheong-gaggwa sigaggwa ma-eum-eul dusin bun-i geubun-isila. geudaedeul-ui gamsaham-i cham-eulo jeogdoda.’
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘daejieseo geudaedeul-eul changjohasin bun-i geubun-isila. geuligo geubunkkelo geudaedeul-eun sojibdoel geos-ila’
geudeul-i malhagil : “geudaedeul-i jinsil-eul malhaneun jadeul-ilamyeon i yagsog-eun eonjeinga?”
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geu jisig-eun ojig hananimkkeman iss-eul ppun-imyeo naneun ojig myeongbaeghan gyeong-gojail ppun-ila’
geulihayeo geudeul-i geugeos(yagsog)eul gakkai boge doel ttae bulsinhadeon jadeul-ui eolgul-eun ilgeuleojil geos-imyeo, mogsoliga deullil geos-ini ‘igeos-i neohuideul-i jaechoghadeon geos-ila’

geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-eun saeng-gaghae bola : hananimkkeseo naleul geuligo nawa hamkke issneun jadeul-eul pamyeolsikigeona hog-eun uliege jabileul bepusindaedo, gotongseuleoun beollobuteo bulsinjadeul-eul guwonhae jul janeun nugulan mal-inga? ’

geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geubun-eun gajang jabilousin bun-ila. ulineun geubun-eul mid-eumyeo geubunkke uitaghayeossnola. geuleoni geudaedeul-eun nuga bunmyeonghan banghwang sog-e issneunji god alge doel geos-ila’

geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geudaedeul-eun saeng-gaghae bola : man-yag geudaedeul-ui mul-i ttang sog-eulo seumyeodeul-eo gandago haess-eul ttae geudaedeul-ege heuleuneun mul-eul gajyeool janeun nugulan mal-inga?’
nun. pen-eul dugo maengseko, geuligo geudeul(salamdeul)i giloghaneun geos-eul dugo maengseko
geudae junim-ui eunchong-e uihae geudae(muhammadeu)neun michin jaga anila
jinsillo geudaeegeneun kkeunh-iji anhneun bosang-i issnola
geuligo jinsillo geudaeneun gogyeolhan pumseong-eul jinyeossdoda
geuleoni geudaeneun bol geos-imyeo geudeuldo bol geos-ila
geudaedeul jung nuga siheom badgo issneun jainji (bol geos-ila)

sillo geudaeui junim geubunkkeseoneun nuga geubun-ui gil-eul beos-eona banghwanghaneunji gajang jal algo gyesin bun-imyeo geubunkkeseoneun nuga indoui gil-eul geodneun jadeul-inji gajang jal algo gyesin bun-ila
geuleoni geudaeneun jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-eul ttaleuji malla
geudeul-eun geudaega (geudeul-eul) nageus-i daehayeo geudeuldo (geudaeleul) nageus-i daehagil galmanghadeola
geuligo geudaeneun maengseleul nambalhaneun bicheonhan eotteon nugudo ttaleuji malla
(geuneun) heomdam-eul ilsamgo dwis-soli hamyeo dol-adanineun jala
(geuneun) jib-yohi seon(seon)eul maggo jeog-uijeog-eulo haengdonghaneun joejisneun jala
ppunman anila (geuneun) moseub-i hyung-aghago taesaeng-i mohohan jala
geuneun jaesangwa jason-eul soyuhaessdaneun iyulo
geuege naui jingpyoga nangsongdoel ttae geuneun “(igeos-eun) yesnal salamdeul-ui seolhwa” lago malhadeola
naneun geuui ko wie pyosileul saegil geos-ila

sillo naneun geudeul-eul siheomhayeoss-euni machi jeong-won-ui soyujadeul-eul siheomhan geosgwa gatnola : geudeul-eun, achim-eul maj-ihaess-eul ttae jeongnyeongko geugeos(yeolmae)eul ttal geos-ila maengsehadeola
geuleona geudeul-eun ye-oeleul duji anh-assnola
geulihayeo geudeul-i janeun sai geudae junim-eulobuteoui jaeang-i geugeos(jeong-won)eul maemdol-assnola
geulihayeo geugeos(jeong-won)eun chilheug-ui bamgwa gat-i doeeossnola
geuleohge geudeul-eun achim-eul maj-ihaess-eul ttae seologa seololeul buleudeola
‘geudaedeul-i (yeolmaeleul) ttalyeo handamyeon geudaedeul-ui gyeongjagjilo achim iljjig tteonasio’
geulihayeo geudeul-eun bimilseule iyagihamyeo chulbalhayeossnola
‘oneul-eun eotteon bul-uhan jado geudaedeul-ege deul-eoomyeon jeoldaelo an doeo’
geudeul-eun jeojie gwanhan gud-eun gyeolsim-eul jinin chae achim iljjig tteonassnola
geulihayeo geudeul-i geugeos(jeong-won)eul boass-eul ttae malhagil “jinsillo ulineun gil-eul jalmos deul-eossnola”
“geuleohji anhnola. ulineun jeji bad-eun jadeul-ila”
geudeul jung-ui gajang baleun jaga malhagil “naega geudaedeul-ege (hananim-eul) chan-yanghaeya handago malhaji anh-assneunga?”
geudeul-i malhagil “jeohuiui junim-eun wanbyeoghasin bun-imyeo sillo jeohuineun budanghan jadeul-ieossseubnida”
geudeul-eun seologa seololeul balabomyeo sangdaeleul wonmanghadeola
geudeul-i malhagil “jaeang-idoda! sillo ulineun gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseon jadeul-ieossseubnida”
“uliui junimkkeseo uliege geuboda deo joh-eun geos-eulo daechehae jusigil balabnida. sillo ulineun uliui junimkke somanghal ppun-ibnida”
beol-ilan jeoleohadoda. geuleona geudeul-i algo issdamyeon sillo naese-ui beol-eun deo keunola
sillo hananim-eul gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eun geudeul junimkke gakkaun gos-eseo gippeum-ui cheongug-eul gajil geos-ila
geuleondedo naega, sunjonghaneun jadeul-eul aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeulgwa gat-i dundan mal-inga
geudaedeul-ege museun il-i il-eonan geos-inga? geudaedeul-eun eotteohge pangyeolhaneun geos-inga
animyeon geugeos(pangyeol)eul wihayeo geudaedeul-i ilgneun chaeg-ilado issdan mal-inga
sillo geudaedeul-eun goleuneun daelo gajil geos-ilaneun mal-i geu(chaeg) an-e issneun geos-inga
animyeon geudaedeul-i buhwal-ui nalkkaji jisogdoeneun, naega chaeg-imjil maengseleul gajigo iss-eo sillo geudaedeul-eun pangyeolhaneun daelo gajindan mal-inga
geudae(muhammadeu)neun geudeul-ege geudeul jung-ui nuga geugeos-eul bojeunghal geos-inji mul-eobola
animyeon geudeul-ege (hananimgwa) daedeunghan jonjaedeul-i issdan mal-inga? geuleohdamyeon, geudeul-i jinsildoen jadeul-ilamyeon geudeul-i malhaneun daedeunghan jonjaedeul-eul gajyeowa bodolog hala
geunal jeong-gang-iga nochuldoego geudeul-eun buboghal geos-eul yogubad-euna (geuleohge) hajileul moshadeola

geudeul-ui nun-eun tteolgueojil geos-imyeo gul-yog-i geudeul-eul deopchil geos-ila. geudeul-eun imi (hyeonse-ui) anjeonhan sangtaeeseo buboghal geos-eul yogubad-ass-euna geudeul-eun midongdo anh-assnola
geuleoni geudae(muhammadeu)neun nawa, i malsseum-eul bujeonghaneun jaleul noh-a dula. naneun geudeul-i alji moshaneun gos-eseo geudeul-eul seoseohi ogjoel geos-ila
naneun geudeul-eul bolyuhal geos-ini sillo naui gyelyag-eun ganglyeoghanola
geudae(muhammadeu)ga geudeul-ege bosulado yoguhaneun geos-inga? geuleohdamyeon geudeul-eun bij-eulo malmiam-a heoliga hwige doel geos-ila
animyeon geudeul-ege, boiji anhneun yeong-yeog(e daehan jisig)ilado iss-eo geudeul-i (geugeos-eul) giloghaneun geos-inga
geuleoni geudae(muhammadeu)neun geudae junim-ui pangyeol-e innaehago mulgogiui donglyo(yona)cheoleom doeji malla : geuneun sileum-e jamgin chae (hananim-eul) bulleossnola
geuui junim-ui eunchong-i geuege dadaleuji anh-assdeolamyeon sillo geuneun binanbad-eumyeo beolpan-e naedeonjyeojyeoss-eul geos-ila
geulihayeo geuui junim-eun geuleul seontaeghasieo seonlyanghan jadeul jung-ui hanalo dusyeossnola
bulsinhan jadeul-eun kkulan-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae sillo geudeul-ui nun-eulosseo geudae(muhammadeu)leul geoui neom-eotteulilyeo hamyeonseo “geuneun jinsillo michin jala” go malhadeola
geuleona geugeos(kkulan)eun jonjaehaneun modeun geos-eul wihan mesijie daleum anila
gipilko chaj-aol nal
gipilko chaj-aol nal-ilan mueos-inga
mueos-i geudaeege gipilko chaj-aol nal-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
ssamudeu bujoggwa adeu bujog-eun daejaeang-ui nal-eul bujeonghayeossnola
ssamudeu bujog-i geughan-ui gotong-eulosseo pamyeoldoeeossdamyeon
adeu bujog-eun hoghan-ui sanaun balam-eulosseo pamyeoldoeeossnola

geubunkkeseo geugeos(balam)eul guljongsikisim-e (balam-eun) ilgob bamgwa yeodeolb naj dong-an geudeul-eul deopchigo hulyeossnola. geulihayeo geu ttae geudaeneun muliga gokkulajyeo iss-eum-eul boni geudeul-eun machi sseuleojyeo beolin yajasuui momtong-gwado gatdeola
geuleoni geudaeneun geudeul jung-e nam-a issneun eotteon geos-ilado bol su issneunga
palaowa geu ijeon-ui jadeulgwa dwijibhyeojin ma-eul(jumindeul)eun joeleul gajigo wassnola
geuleohge geudeul-eun geudeul junim-ui sado-e bulboghayeoss-euni geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-eul gyeoglyeolhi pamyeolsikisyeossnola
sillo naneun mul-i gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseoss-eul ttae geudaedeul-eul bangjue taewossnola
geulihayeo naega geugeos-eul geudaedeul-eul wihan tteoollim-eulo dugo, myeongsimhaneun gwiga geugeos-eul myeongsimhagi wiham-ila
ije napal-e sum-i han beon bulligo
daejiwa sandeul-i deulliuni geugeosdeul-i hanbeon-e sansanjogag-i nadeola
geuleohge geunal, pihal su eobsneun nal-i dagchyeowassnola
haneul-eun gallajyeoss-euni geugeos-eun geunal heuneulheuneulhadeola
cheonsadeul-eun geugeos(haneul)ui yeoleo kkeutjalag wie iss-eul geos-imyeo, geudeul(cheonsadeul) wie issneun yeodeolb(cheonsadeul)i geunal geudae junim-ui gwonjaleul tteobadchil geos-ila
geunal geudaedeul-eun deuleonage doel geos-ini geudaedeul-ui eotteohan naemilhan haeng-wido sumgyeojiji anh-eul geos-ila
gilogbuleul jasin-ui oleunjjog-eseo bad-eun janeun malhal geos-ini “ibosio. geudaedeul-eun naui gilogbuleul ilg-eusio”
“sillo naneun naui gyesan gyeolgwaleul majdagtteulil geos-ila hwagsinhayeossso”
geulihayeo geuneun manjogseuleon salm-eul yeong-wihadeola
jigohan cheongug-eseola
geugos(cheongug)ui gwasil-eun deuliwojyeo issnola
geudaedeul-eun swii meoggo masila, jinan nal geudaedeul-i haenghan il-e daehan daegala
gilogbuleul jasin-ui oenjjog-eseo bad-eun janeun malhal geos-ini “naega naui gilogbuleul badji anh-assdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
“naega naui gyesan gyeolgwaga mueos-inji mollassdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
“geugeos(jug-eum)eulo da kkeutna beolyeossdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!”
“nae jaesan-i na-ege botaem-i doeji moshaneunguna”
“nae gwonlyeogdo na-egeseo salajyeo beolyeossguna”
geudaedeul(cheonsadeul)eun geuleul jab-a pobaghala
geuleon hu taoleuneun bul(jiog)eulo geuleul bultaeula
geuleon hu gil-iga chilsib cheog-in saseul sog-eulo geuleul jib-eoneoh-eula
sillo ijeon-e geuneun gajang wieomhasin hananim-eul midji anh-assnola
geuneun ttohan bul-uhan jadeul-eul meog-ineun ildo gwon-yuhaji anh-assnola
geuleohgie oneul yeogiseo geuege hyeol-yug-eun eobs-eumyeo
goleum ioeeneun meog-eul geos-i eobsnola
geugeos-eul meogneun janeun ojig joejieun jadeul ppun-ila
geuleoni naneun geudaedeul-i boneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
geuligo geudaedeul-i boji moshaneun geos-eul dugo maengsehanola
jinsillo geugeos-eun myeong-yeloun sadoui mal-ini
geugeos-eun siin-ui mal-i anila. geudaedeul-i midneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
geugeos-eun jeomsulgaui maldo anila. geudaedeul-i gip-i saeng-gaghaneun geos-eun jogeum-il ppun-ideola
man-yuui junim-eulobuteo naelyeoon geos-ila
man-yag geu(muhammadeu)ga na-e gwanhae yeoleo maldeul jung-ui ilbuleul jieonaessdamyeon
naneun geuleul ganglyeoghi umkyeojab-ass-eul geos-ila
geuleon hu sillo naneun geulobuteo daedongmaeg-eul kkeunh-eo beolyeoss-eul geos-ila
geuleom-edo geudaedeul jung eotteon nugudo geubun-eul galomagji moshal geos-ila
sillo geugeos(kkulan)eun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eul wihan tteoollim-ila
jinsillo naneun geudaedeul jung-e jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-i iss-eum-eul algo issnola
jinsillo geugeos(kkulan)eun bulsinjadeul-ui aetongham-ila
geuligo jinsillo geugeos(kkulan-eun) hwagsilhan jinlila
geuleoni geudaeneun gajang wieomhasin geudae junim-ui ileum-eul deunop-ila
yoguhaneun jaga dagchyeool beol-eul yoguhayeossdoda
(geu beol-eun) bulsinjadeul-eul wihan geos-euloseo, geugeos(beol)eul jeojihal jonjaeneun eobsnola
(geu beol-eun) seungcheon-ui gil-eul soyuhasin hananim-eulobuteo (oneun geos-ila)
geunal cheonsadeulgwa yeonghon-i geubunkkelo ollagani geunal-ui gigan-eun omannyeon-ila
geuleoni geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
sillo geudeul-eun geugeos(beol)eul meolge bojiman
naneun geugeos(beol)eul gakkabge bonola
geunal haneul-eun eong-gin gileumcheoleom doel geos-ila
geuligo sandeul-eun yangteolcheoleom doel geos-ila
ttohan hyeol-yug-eun (daleun) hyeol-yug-e daehae mudji anh-eul geos-ila

geudeul(hyeol-yug)i geudeul(daleun hyeol-yug)eul boge doem-edo (seoloui anbuleul mudji anh-eul geos-ila). aghaeng-eul jeojileun janeun geunal-ui jingbeol-eul beos-eonagi wihae jasin-ui jason-eul momgabs-eulo bachil suman issdamyeon hago galmanghadeola
jasin-ui baeujawa jasin-ui hyeongjewa
jasin-eul gamssajudeon gakkaun chincheoggwa
jigusang-e issneun moduleul bachyeoseolado geugeos(geudeul-ui momgabs)i geuleul guhae jugil (galmanghadeola)
geuleohji anhnola. geugeos(jiog)eun jag-yeolhaneun bulgil-ila
(jiog-eun) meoli kkeobjil-eul beosgyeo naemyeo
kkongmunileul ppaemyeo dol-aseossdeon jaleul buleul geos-ila
(jaesan-eul) mo-eugo ssah-a dudeon ja(leul buleul geos-ila)
sillo ingan-eun bin-yaghage changjodoeeossnola
geuege nappeun geos-i seuchimyeon keuge geunsimhago
geuege joh-eun geos-i seuchimyeon insaeghadeola
geuleona yebae deulineun jadeul-eun ye-oela
geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui yebaee iss-eo bujileonhan jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui jaesan-e iljeonghan mogs-i issneun jadeul-ini
gugeolhaneun gananhan jawa gugeolhaji anhneun gananhan jaleul wiham-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun simpan-ui nal-eul mid-eumyeo
geudeul junim-ui beol-e daehayeo sillo geunsimhaneun jadeul-ila
sillo geudeul junim-ui beol-ilan anjeonhae hal su eobsneun geos-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo jasin-ui sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-ila
geuleona geudeul-ui baeujana geudeul-ui oleunson-i soyuhan ja(noye)e gwanhayeoneun geudeul-i chaegmangbadji anhnola
geuleondedo geu ioeui geos-eul domohaneun jadeul-i issdamyeon jeodeul-eun sillo gyeong-gyeleul neom-eun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui sutagmulgwa gyeyag-eul jung-yohasineun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo gudgeonhi geudeul-ui jeung-eon-eul seoneun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui yebaeleul jikim-e kkujunhadeola
geudeul-eun cheongug-e iss-eul myeong-yeloun jadeul-ila
bulsinhan jadeul-i geudae geuncheoeseo seoduleuni i eojjidoen il-inga
oleunjjoggwa oenjjog-eseo (geudeul-eun) gunjibhayeo issdeola
geudeul jung-ui modeun iga gippeum-ui cheongug-eulo ibseongdoegil huimanghandan mal-inga
geuleohji anhnola. sillo naneun, geudeul-i algo issneun geos-eulobuteo geudeul-eul changjohayeossnola
geulihayeo naega dongjjogdeulgwa seojjogdeul-ui junim-eul geolgo maengsehani jinsillo naneun neunglyeog-eul gajin jala
naneun geudeulboda deo hullyunghan jonjaelo daechehal neunglyeog-eul jinyeoss-euni geu nugudo naleul apseogal su eobsnola
geuleoni geudaeneun geudeul-eul noh-adula ; geudeul-eun nodag-imyeo noldaga gyeolgug geudeul-ui yagsogbad-eun nal-eul majdagtteulige doel geos-ila
geunal geudeul-eun machi usang jedan-eulo bunjuhi idonghaneun geoscheoleom geuleohge myojieseo jaeppalli geol-eo naol geos-ila
geudeul-ui nun-eun tteolgueojil geos-imyeo gul-yog-i geudeul-eul deopchil geos-ini jeo nal-eun geudeul-i yagsogbaddeon geunal-ila
sillo naneun noaleul geuui salamdeul-ege bonaessnola : “geudaeui salamdeul-ege gotongseuleoun beol-i chaj-aogi jeon-e geudaeneun geudeul-ege gyeong-gohala”
geuga malhagil “naui salamdeul-iyeo. sillo naneun geudaedeul-eul wihan myeongbaeghan gyeong-gojala”
“geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul gyeongbaehago geubun-eul gyeong-oehamyeo naleul ttaleula”

“geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-eul wihae geudaedeul-ui joeleul yongseohayeo jusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul jijeongdoen gihankkaji neujchueo jusil geos-ila. geudaedeul-i andamyeon sillo hananim-ui gihan, geugeos-i dolaehaess-eul ttaeneun neujchueojiji anhnola”
geuga malhagil “jeoui junim, sillo jeoneun jeoui salamdeul-eul bamnaj-eulo bulleossseubnida”
“geuleona jeoui buleum-eun ojig geudeul-ui hoepiman-eul jeung-gasikyeoss-eul ppun-ibnida”

“dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul yongseohae jusigi wihae jega geudeul-eul buleul ttaemada geudeul-eun songalag-eul gwie daego jasin-ui os-eulo mom-eul deop-eo ssamyeo gyesoghaeseo geoman-eul tteol-eossseubnida”
“geu hu sillo jeoneun geudeul-eul solinaeeo bulleossseubnida”
“geu hu sillo jeoneun geudeul-ege gongpyohagido hago, bimilseule sogongeolimyeo geudeul-ege malhagido hayeossseubnida”
“geulihayeo jega malhayeossseubnida : ‘geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul junim-ege yongseoleul guhala. sillo geubunkkeseoneun gajang neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-idoda' ”
‘geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul wilo julgichan bileul bonaejusil geos-ila’
‘geuligo geudaedeul-ege jaesangwa jason-eul neullyeojusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae jeong-won-eul dusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae gang-eul dusil geos-ila’
‘geudaedeul-eun hananim-ui wieom-eul gaeuichi anh-euni i eojjidoen il-inga?’
‘sillo geubunkkeseoneun jeomjinjeog-eulo geudaedeul-eul changjohasyeossnola’
‘hananimkkeseo eotteohge ilgob gaeui haneul-eul cheungcheung-i changjohasyeossneunji geudaedeul-eun alji moshaneunga?’
‘geubunkkeseoneun dal-eul geu(haneul) an-e bich-eulo dusyeoss-eumyeo taeyang-eul deungbullo dusyeossnola’
‘hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul heulg-eulobuteo jalanage hasyeossnola’
‘geu hu geubunkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul geugos(heulg)eulo dol-agage hasigo geudaedeul-eul kkeonaesil geos-ila’
‘hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul wihae daejileul yungdan-eulo dusyeossnola’
‘geudaedeul-i geu an-eseo neolb-eun gil-eul deunadeul su issdolog ham-ila’
noaga malhagil “jeoui junim. sillo geudeul-eun jeoege bulboghayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-eun, jasin-ui jaesangwa jasig-eulosseo ojig jasin-ege sonsilman-eul jeung-gasikineun jaleul ttalassseubnida”
“geuligo geudeul-eun maeu keodalan chaeglyag-eul kkumyeossseubnida”
“geuligo geudeul-eun malhaessseubnida : ‘geudaedeul-eun jeoldae geudaedeul-ui usang-eul pogihaji malmyeo jeoldae wasdeuwa suwa-euwa yagusseuwa yaukkeuwa naseuleuleul pogihaji malla’
“sillo geudeul-eun manh-eun ideul-eul banghwangke hayeossseubnida. dangsinkkeseoneun budanghan jadeul-ege ojig banghwangman-eul deohae jusibsio”
geudeul-ui joelo malmiam-a geudeul-eun igsahayeossgo geu hu bul sog-eulo deul-eogage doeeoss-euni geudeul-eun hananim-i anin geudeul-eul wihan jolyeogjadeul(usangdeul)eul balgyeonhaji moshayeossnola
noaga malhagil "jeoui junim. bulsinjadeul jung-e eotteon ingando jigusang-e naebeolyeoduji masibsio
“sillo dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul naebeolyeodusindamyeon geudeul-eun dangsin-ui jongbogdeul-eul banghwangke hal geos-imyeo geudeul-eun ojig saaghan bulsinjaman nah-eul geos-ibnida”

“jeoui junim. jeoleul yongseohayeo jusigo jeoui bumonimgwa, midneun jaloseo jeoui jib-e deul-eowassdeon jawa, midneun namseongdeulgwa midneun yeoseongdeul-eul yongseohayeo jusibsio. geuligo budanghan jadeul-egeneun ojig pagoeman-eul deohae jusibsio”
geudaeneun malhala : na-ege da-eum-ui gyesiga naelyeojyeossnola ; jin-ui han muliga gyeongcheonghan hu malhagil "sillo ulineun nollaun nangsong-eul deul-eossseubnida
geugeos(kkulan)eun olbaleum-eulo ganeun gil-eul galikigie ulineun geugeos-eul mid-eossseubnida. geuligo ulineun uli junimkke eotteon daedeunghan jonjaedo duji anh-eul geos-ibnida
sillo uli junim-ui bu(bu)neun jigohasimyeo geubunkkeseoneun baeujado jasigdo gajiji anh-eusyeossseubnida
sillo uli jung-ui umaehan janeun hananim-e gwanhayeo gadanghaji anhneun mal-eul hagon hayeossseubnida
“sillo ulineun ingangwa jin-i hananim-e gwanhayeo gyeolko geojis-eul malhaji anh-eul geos-ila saeng-gaghayeossseubnida”
“sillo ingan namseongdeul-eun jin namseongdeul-ege boholeul yocheonghagon hayeossgo geulihayeo geudeul(ingan)eun geudeul(jin)ege geodeuleum-eul deohae jueossseubnida”
“geuligo sillo geudeul(ingan)eun, geudaedeul(jin)i saeng-gaghan geoscheoleom hananimkkeseo geu nugudo gyeolko buhwalsikiji anh-eul geos-ila saeng-gaghayeossseubnida”
“sillo uliga haneul-eul hult-eoboassdeoni geugos(haneul)i pasukkundeulgwa byeolttongbyeoldeullo gadeugchan geos-eul balgyeonhayeossseubnida”

“sillo ulineun yeosdeudgi wihae geugos(haneul)e chagseoghagon hayeossseubnida. geuleona yeosdeul-eulyeo haneun janeun ije, geuleul wihae junbidoen eomhohaneun byeolttongbyeol-e jigmyeonhaneun geos-ibnida”
“jigue issneun jadeul-ege nappeun geos-i uidodoen geos-inji animyeon geudeul junimkkeseo geudeul-ege joh-eun geos-eul wonhasineun geos-inji sillo ulineun moleubnida”
“sillo uli jung-eneun seonlyanghan jadeul-i issgo uli jung-eneun geuleohji anh-eun jadeul-i issseubnida. ulideul-eun ganeun gil-i jegaggag-ieossseubnida”
“sillo ulineun jigueseo hananim-eul gyeolko pihaegal su eobs-eumyeo domanghandaedo uliga geubun-eul gyeolko pihaegal su eobs-eum-eul hwagsinhayeossseubnida”
“sillo uliga indoui malsseum-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae ulineun geugeos-eul mid-eossseubnida. jasin-ui junim-eul midneun jaga issdamyeon geuneun bujoghamdo budanghamdo dulyeowohaji anh-eul geos-ibnida”
“sillo uliui ilbuneun museullimdeul-imyeo uliui ilbuneun bujolihan jadeul-ibnida. iseullam-eul bad-adeul-in ja geudeul-eun joh-eun geos-eul chuguhan jadeul-ibnida”
“bujolihan jadeul-e gwanhaeseoneun geudeul-eun jiog-eul wihan jangjagdeomiga doel geos-ibnida”
man-yag geudeul-i olbaleun gil-eul ttaleumyeo gudgeonhayeossdamyeon naneun geudeul-i pungseonghan mul-eul masidolog hayeoss-eul geos-ila
geulihayeo naneun geu(eunchong)e gwanhae geudeul-eul siheomhanola. jasin-ui junim-eul tteoollineun il-e deungdollineun ja geubunkkeseoneun geuleul godoen beol sog-e deulge hasil geos-ila
sillo seong-won-eun hananim-eul wihan geos-ini geudaedeul-eun hananimgwa deobul-eo daleun geos-e gidohaji malla
sillo hananim-ui jongbog-i seoseo geubunkke gidohal ttae geudeul-eun geuege milchaghagi jigjeon-ieossnola
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : 'naneun ojig naui junimkke gidohal ppun-imyeo geubunkke eotteon daedeunghan jonjaedo duji anhnola
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : 'sillo naneun geudaedeul-ege eotteon haeag-ina joh-eun geosdo tongjehaji moshanola
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : ‘geu nugudo hananim-eulobuteo naleul guwonhaji moshamyeo naneun gyeolko geubun ioeui dopicheoleul chaj-ji moshal geos-ila’

‘geuleona hananim-eulobuteoui (jinli) jeondalgwa geubun-ui mesijineun naui mogs-ila. hananimgwa geuui sado-e bulboghaneun jaga issdamyeon sillo jiog-ui bul-i geuui geos-ini geudeul-eun geugos-eseo yeong-wonhi meomul geos-ila’
‘(geudeul-ui bulsin-eun) geudeul-i yagsogbad-eun geos-eul bol ttaekkajila. geu ttae geudeul-eun nuga deo heoyaghan jolyeogjaleul gajigo deo jeog-eun susjaga doel geos-inji alge doel geos-ila’
geudae(muhammadeu)neun malhala : 'geudaedeul-i yagsogbad-eun geos-i gakkaunji animyeon naui junimkkeseo geugeos-e gihan-eul dusyeossneunji naneun moleunola
‘boiji anhneun geosdo asineun bun. geulihayeo geubunkkeseoneun geu nuguegedo geubun-ui boiji anhneun yeong-yeog-eul boyeojuji anh-eusinola’
‘geuleona geubunkkeseo seontaeghasin sadoneun ye-oeloseo sillo geubunkkeseoneun geuui apjjoggwa geuui dwijjog saie eomhohaneun jadeul-eul bonaesinola’

‘ineun, geudeul(ijeon sadodeul)i imi geudeul junim-ui mesijileul jeondalhayeoss-eum-eul geu(sado)ga aldolog hagi wiham-ila. geuligo geubunkkeseoneun geudeul-ege issneun geos-eul auleusimyeo modeun geos-eul susjalo healisyeossnola’
os-eul duleun jayeo
geudaeneun eolmagan-eul je-oehagoneun hanbamjung-e il-eona yebaehala
geuttae(bam)ui jeolban-eul yebaehageona geogiseo jogeumman jul-igeona
geogie deohala. geuligo geudaeneun kkulan-eul cheoncheonhi nangsonghala
sillo naneun geudaeege mugeoun malsseum-eul deonjil geos-ila
sillo hanbam-e il-eonaseo deulineun yebae geugeos-eun gajang gyeongohan geos-imyeo gajang olgod-eun mal-ila
sillo naj-eneun geudaeege gidalan bunjuham-i jueojinola
geudaeneun geudae junim-ui ileum-eul tteoolligo oloji geubunkkelo jeonnyeomhala
dongjjoggwa seojjog-ui junim, geubun ioeeneun gyeongbaebad-eul jonjaega eobs-euni geudaeneun geubun-eul uitag-ui daesang-eulo dula
geudaeneun geudeul-i haneun mal-e innaehago geudeul-eul aleumdabge meollihala
geuligo geudaeneun nawa anlagham-eul jinin jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-eul noh-adugo geudeul-eul eolmagan neujchueo jula
sillo na-egeneun jogswaewa taoleuneun bul-i iss-eumyeo
mog-eul me-uneun eumsiggwa gotongseuleon beol-i issnola
geunal daejiwa sandeul-eun yodongchimyeo sandeul-eun muneojyeonaelil molae eondeog-i doel geos-ila
sillo naneun geudaedeul-ege geudaedeul-e daehan jeung-eonjaga doel sadoleul bonaess-euni machi naega palao-ege sadoleul bonaen geosgwa gatnola
geuleona palaoneun sado-ege bulboghayeossgo ie naneun geuleul geochilge umkyeojab-assnola
geuleondedo man-yag geudaedeul-i bulsinhandamyeon, geubunkkeseo eolin-ideul-eul baegbalnoindeullo mandeusineun geunal(ui beol)eul geudaedeul-i eotteohge mag-eul geos-inga
haneul-eun geulo inhae gallajil geos-ila. geubun-ui yagsog-eun silhaengdoege doeeo issnola
sillo igeos-eun tteoollim-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo hyanghaneun gil-eul jab-eula

sillo geudae junimkkeseoneun geudaega bam-ui sambun-ui iboda deo jeogge, geugeos(bam)ui jeolban-eul, geugeos-ui sambun-ui il-eul il-eona yebaehaneun geos-eul algo gyesimyeo geudaewa hamkke issneun jadeul jung-ui han mulido machangajila. hananimkkeseoneun bamgwa naj-eul jojeolhasinola. geubunkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i geugeos(bam)eul saeul su eobs-eum-eul algo gyesyeossgie geudaedeul-ui nwiuchim-eul bad-ajusyeossnola. geuleoni geudaedeul-eun kkulan jung-e swibge dagaoneun geos-eul ilg-eula. geubunkkeseoneun geudaedeul jung-e byeongjadeul-i iss-eul geos-igo daleun ideul-eun hananim-ui eunhyeleul ganguhamyeo daejileul yeohaenghal geos-imyeo daleun ideul-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo jeontue chamjeonhal geos-im-eul algo gyesyeossnola. geuleoni geudaedeul-eun geugeos(kkulan) jung-e swibge dagaoneun geos-eul ilg-eula. geuligo geudaedeul-eun kkujunhi yebaeleul deuligo uimu huisageum-eul naemyeo hananim-eul wihae dollyeobadji anh-eul bij-eul naejula. geudaedeul jasindeul-eul wihae naenohneun geu eotteon jaesando geudaedeul-eun hananim ap-eseo geugeos-i sillo deo hullyunghago deo widaehan bosang-i iss-eum-eul balgyeonhal geos-ila. geudaedeul-eun hananimkke yongseoleul guhala. sillo hananimkkeseoneun neogeuleoi yongseohasineun jaaelousin bun-ila
oetuleul deop-eun jayeo
il-eonaseo gyeong-gohala
geudae junim-ui widaeham-eul chan-yanghago
geudaeui os-eun jeonghwahamyeo
usang-eun meollihala
geuligo deo manh-i bad-eulyeo eunhyeleul bepulji malmyeo
geudae junim-eul wihae innaehala
geulihayeo napal-i bullil ttae
sillo geunal-eun eolyeoun nal-ila
bulsinjadeul-ege swibji anh-eun nal-ila
geudaeneun nawa naega holmom-eulo changjohan jaleul noh-adula
naneun geuleul wihae jeulbihan jaesan-eul dueossgo
hamkke haneun jasondeul-eul dueossnola
geuligo naneun geuleul wihae manh-eun geos-eul pyeolchyeo jueossnola
geu huedo geuneun naega deohae jugileul huimanghadeola
geuleohji anhnola. sillo geuneun naui jingpyoe daehae gojibbulineun jayeossnola
naneun geuege godoen beol-i deopchige hal geos-ila
sillo geuneun saeng-gaghago jaedeola
geuleoni geuga jaeneun bangbeob-e jeojuga issnola
dasi hanbeon, geuga jaeneun bangbeob-e jeojuga issnola
geu hu geuneun boassgo
geu hu geuneun eolgul-eul jjipuligo jjing-geulyeossnola
geu hu geuneun kkongmunileul ppaemyeo geomanhae hayeossnola
geulihayeo geuga malhagil : "igeos-eun ojig jeonhaejyeo naelyeooneun jusul-il ppun-ila
igeos-eun ojig ingan-ui mal-il ppun-ila
naneun geuleul tteugeoun buljiog-eulo taeul geos-ila
mueos-i geudaeege tteugeoun buljiog-i mueos-injileul allyeo jul geos-inga
geugeos-eun namgyeodujido anh-eumyeo naebeolyeodujido anh-eumyeo
pibuleul guwobeolinola
yeol-ahob-i geugeos-eul chaeg-imjinola

naneun buljiog-ui gwanlijadeul-eul ojig cheonsadeulloman dueoss-eumyeo, naneun geudeul-ui susjaleul ojig bulsinhaneun jadeul-e daehan siheom-eulo dueossnola. geulihayeo seongseoleul bad-eun jadeul-i hwagsin-eul eodgo, midneun jadeul-i mid-eum-i jeung-gadoemyeo, seongseoleul bad-eun jadeulgwa sin-ang-indeul-i uisimhaji anhgi wiham-ila. geuleona ma-eum sog-e byeong-i issneun jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun 'i biyulosseo hananim-i wonhaneun geos-eun mueos-inga?' lago malhadeola. geuleohge hananimkkeseoneun geubunkkeseo wonhasineun jaleul banghwangsikisigo geubunkkeseo wonhasineun jaleul indohasinola. ojig geubunman-i geudae junim-ui gundaeleul algo gyesinola. geugeos(buljiog)eun daleum anin ingan-eul wihan tteoollim-ila
geuleohji anhnola. dal-eul dugo maengseko
jachwileul gamchul ttaeui bam-eul dugo maengseko
balg-aol ttaeui achim-eul dugo maengseko
jinsillo geugeos(buljiog)eun eomahan geos jung-ui hanaimyeo
ingan-eul wihan gyeong-goini
geudaedeul jung-eseo ap-eulo naagageona hog-eun dwilo mulleoseogoja haneun jaleul wihan geos-ila
modeun yeonghon-eun geuga eod-eun geos-eulo jeondang jabhyeo issnola
geuleona upyeon-ui geojujadeul-eun ye-oela
cheongug-eseo geudeul-eun seolo mul-euni
aghaeng-eul jeojileun jadeul-e gwanhaeseola
mueos-i geudaedeul-eul tteugeoun buljiog-e deulge hayeossneunga
geudeul-i malhagil : "ulineun yebae deulineun jadeul-i anieossgo
bul-uhan jadeul-ege eumsig-eul jujido anh-assso
ulineun nodag-ineun jadeulgwa hamkke nodag-yeossgo
simpan-ui nal-eul bujeonghayeoss-euni”
uliege jug-eum-i chaj-aol ttaekkaji geuleohayeossso
geuleoni jungjaejadeul-ui jungjaedo geudeul-egeneun soyong-i eobsnola
